column4: help i just upgraded to 7.10 now 2 of my filesystems are not showing up after a reboot... trying to mount them says its either already mounted or busy, but its not mounted... what gives?
thats the filesystem i need to access
but its supposed to be at /home
does /dev/sda1 show up anywhere in the output of 'mount'?
okay so forget home for the moment. mkdir /tmp/test ; mount /dev/sda1 /tmp/test
i hate to give a windows solution but have you tried rebooting?
also, check dmesg for recent kernel errors regarding hda1
